titleStmt.title: Great and good news from His Grace the Duke of Schomberg's camp at Dundalk containing I. A full account of the discovery of the villianous [sic] design of the French papists, II. The address of the Presbyterian ministers in the north of Ireland to His Grace the Duke of Schomberg, III. The address of the Quakers in the province of Ulster to His Grace the Duke of Schomberg, IV. A true list of the Irish prisoners taken by the renowned men of Eniskillen, at the Battel of Newtown.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
